    def serialize(self):        return {            'project_id': self.project_id,            'organization_id': self.organization_id,            'project_name': self.project_name,            'project_short_description': self.project_short_description,            'project_description': self.project_description,            'project_picture_link': self.project_picture_link,            'project_goal': self.project_goal,            'project_raised': self.project_raised,            'project_city': self.project_city,            'project_state': self.project_state,            'project_country': self.project_country,            'newspaper_id': self.newspaper_id,            'removed': self.removed,        }
